title: Silent Night Sona doesn't do the Christmas jingles anymore
body: Now what's the point of having the skin? Fix pls!

replies.body:
Hiya Thirteenthorder, 

I was able to have her play "Tis the Season" by using her /joke emote.
Speaking of that skin Katey, is there any way we can have it turned slightly louder? It's rather quiet.
